data.title: AOV
data.statement: The game master guarantees each player a minimum of 750 diamonds spent in Arena of Valor. Some players may have spent less than 750 during the event. To ensure fairness, the game master will grant additional diamonds directly into each player’s account, which they immediately spend on in‑game items, bringing their total spending up to at least 750. Compute the total number of diamonds the game master must distribute.

data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A single integer: the total extra diamonds the game master must give

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The game master guarantees each player a minimum of 750 diamonds spent in Arena of Valor. Some players may have spent less than 750 during the event. To ensure fairness, the game master will grant additional diamonds directly into each player’s account, which they immediately spend on in‑game items, bringing their total spending up to at least 750. Compute the total number of diamonds the game master must distribute.
Input
Line 1: An integer n — the number of players.
Line 2: n space‑separated integers S₁, S₂, …, Sₙ — diamonds each player has already spent.
Output
Line 1: A single integer: the total extra diamonds the game master must give
Constraints
1 ≤ n ≤ 10
0 ≤ Sᵢ ≤ 2000
Example
Input
5
0 100 749 751 500
Output
1651
